website_summaries.verdict: Traditional style of towel ring with a closed loop look that's easy to install.
pros: Offered in either oil rubbed bronze or brushed nickel finishes
Looks great paired with almost any kind of bathroom or kitchen sink hardware
Will fit most sizes of hand towels easily
cons: Closed loop design means it's not quite as handy as hook design

customer_reviews.title: Works until it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: So, I was on here searching for a replacement for my hand towel rack, because it just decided to fall apart, and came across this listing, which, it turns out, is the exact item I bought less than three years ago. For three years, this towel rack was great. Easy to install, worked as any respectable metal circle should, until one day, the bronze portion just fell off of the wall fixture. No rhyme or reason as to which part failed, and nothing I can do will get it to go back on. So... if you want a decent hand towel rack for almost three years, and a surprise one morning, get this one.
customer_reviews.author: loveabull

customer_reviews.title: This is a dark, dull brown, not oil rubbed bronze.
customer_reviews.text: The color is a cheap, dull, brown paint. Will not match other pieces which are actually oil rubbed bronze in color.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Not oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go with several other pieces of new hardware in our bathroom (lights, cabinet door pulls, hinges, knobs) but while all the other pieces have the copper highlights, this looks like nothing more than wrought iron. Coming from Moen, and having a new Moen faucet in oil rubbed bronze finish, this was totally unexpected and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compared to the builder grade towel holder I replaced. The metal on this is so heavy and it feels like a real quality fixture. I love the design and it matches all of the other brushed nickel fixtures in the bathroom. I like how far it comes out of the wall too. I can't say anything negative about this. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JcoTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This towel ring is beautiful and super functional. A huge bonus, is that it holds the towel out away from the wall just enough so water doesn't get all over the wall. It goes in to the wall and is solid. I recommend this towel holder.
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with Moen
customer_reviews.text: I have small bathrooms but wanted some towels to hang. Moen is always flawless and makes great products. I bought two and staggered on the wall and put my bath towels in them. I previously had a towel rack which continued to to pull out of the wall. To date these haven't moved. Looks better than the rack did. Again, its Moen, I am not surprised these are of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT be fooled by the Moen name.  This is cheap, flimsy crap.
customer_reviews.text: Moen used to be a quality name in bath fixtures. Congratulations to the engineering department and upper management, in order to save production costs and boost your bottom line, you have successfully driven the quality of Moen down to "utter crap", cheap, flimsy, "crap". The tubing is so light and so thin it feels like plastic. This is a piece of junk. DO NOT be fooled by the Moen name. It no longer stands for quality.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Not really ORB
customer_reviews.text: The color of the "oil rubbed Bronze" in the picture is slightly misleading in my opinion. The real color is more of a flat brown than an ORB. It doesn't have any highlights or lowlights like the picture. They are a bit on the cheap feeling side as well, but will get the job done. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Ring separates after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product and used for no more than a month and the quality is not good. After a few uses, pulling the towel down, the ring separated and it is impossible to keep the ring togheter. I would not recommend buying it if you want a good product in your bathroom. The looks of the product are good, but not the quality. I can show photos if anyone asks.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It fits so well in our newly remodeled bathroom. The oil rubbed bronze towel ring fit right in with the rest of my fixtures. It matches well. It seems of good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I just installed mine and I'm thrilled. It's perfect, just what I wanted, just as described and shown in the picture and super sturdy! My bathroom just got a facelift. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, looks great in my bathroom. I was looking for something that matched all the other hardware and this is perfect. we bought it in 'brushed nickel' and it looks very nice, not cheap at all, yet this was so much less expensive than what i could find at any hardware or department store.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Easy install; great addition and look.
customer_reviews.text: These were great and simple to install. It was our typical install, but it came with all the correct hardware. Great addition for our bathroom needs. For 1/2 the cost of what Home Depot charges this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JJSoul

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the set, towel ring, towel rack, and paper holder. I have been pleased with the look, and quality. I liked them so much, I have purchased for all three of my bathrooms, just different styles. I would recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: After remodeling our guest bathroom to a more modern, spa inspired design I needed some racks for hand towels. The bathroom isn’t very large so I needed something that was not bulky and that had clean lines. This fit the bill perfectly. They were very easy to install and fit flush with the sheetrock. The color is also very nice and modernizes the whole bathroom. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: girlypantsTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! Looks just the way it does in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: M.R

customer_reviews.title: Quality fee at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice and they aren’t cheap feeling at all. Great for the price point. They don’t have any bronze undertones which is what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: J1976

customer_reviews.title: Masculine durable economical bathroom decor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and rich looking. We have the two robe hooks and the towel bar but this is perfect next to sink. I'm girly-girl a d my husband is a cowboy who prefers the barn. This is a nicely coordinated compromise. It installs easily and the hardware included assures a sturdy mount. This baby won't come down without a fight!! We are both very pleased with this and the other coordinating Moen products.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful towel ring, but does not hold up to family use
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased when we purchased this ring. It was a good price, we loved the finish, and it was very easy to install. About six months after we purchased it, my son pulled the towel a little too hard and one side of the ring came out of the base. I placed it back in, but now either side of the ring will come out of the base easily (by just putting a new towel on it, for example) and will occasionally fall off. We now need to purchase a new towel ring after less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to assemble. This is large enough to hold bath towels, but it could easily be used for hand towels as well. The color has a nice finish, and it felt much heavier than expected. I was very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good for lightweight towels only, but does look really good.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but not very sturdy. Where it mounts to the wall is excellent, but the ring itself would be VERY easy to break. Even though it is a faairly large loop, I wouldn't suggest anything more than a standard towel on it. Anything else and the ring could break or warp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great for facial towel holder. After a year the handle popped out and I had to hammer it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great looking towel ring for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this towel ring! The price was way lower than anywhere else, but more importantly, it looks really good. The instructions for mounting were easy to follow. Not a negative thing to say, all positive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oil. Not Bronze.
customer_reviews.text: The color is black. Oil black. There is nothing bronze about these. No shiny bronze highlights at all like one would expect with something calling itself "oil rubbed BRONZE" I'll either be returning all the Danbury series I bought or end up using them in bathrooms other than the one I purchased them for.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pulsipher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had this very long and it has already come apart after normal use.
customer_reviews.author: TJbeek

customer_reviews.title: beautiful , good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and good quality. I used different wall anchors to make it really secure
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: These towel rings match the rest of the fixtures in ...
customer_reviews.text: These towel rings match the rest of the fixtures in the bathroom, except one tiny, major detail. The other fixtures have a high sheen almost gloss finish, whereas the fixtures (even thought they have the same description as the other fixtures) do not. It's not a BIG deal but, of course, my wife noticed first thing.
customer_reviews.author: Agoric 1

customer_reviews.title: Hand-towel sized effective ring
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty simple towel ring. My wife approved of the oil rubbed bronze and the style. This delivered the expected look (my wife hasn't asked me to replace it), and was fairly straight-forward to install. Overall, I'm happy having this next to the sink holding a hand towel. Not sure I'd put a full-size bath towel through it, but seems relatively good for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Tim from Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The set screw hat holds the bracket against the mounting plate keeps loosening up.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish, easy installation. I wish I had noticed the size of it before purchase. It came out from the wall farther than I expected and the ring was quite a bit larger than the one I was replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice towel ring
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel ring. Decided to get a ring because it takes up less space..never tried one before. Really liked it so bought another. The brushed finish looks neat. Also, these go well with the 2 Moen robe hooks I bought. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Love the matte finish
customer_reviews.text: The finish is lovely and was easy to install. It was a little different that other holders I've installed over the years but still quite easy. Perfect touch for our bathroom refresh.
customer_reviews.author: puzzled91

customer_reviews.title: color not correct
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking towel ring, but it isn't really oil rubbed bronze! All the other items I have that are oil rubbed bronze are brown with a copper color showing through, this towel ring was just solid dark brown, and it didn't match the oil rubbed bronze toilet lever I bought from amazon either. So if you are looking to match other items that are "oil rubbed bronze", you won't be happy with this, I had to return it because it clashed with the faucet I had.
customer_reviews.author: loriandem

customer_reviews.title: Nice Towel Holder
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these towel holders to match existing Moen hardware. I'd give the order 5 stars, however one of my towel rack holder face plates had several deep scratches on the outside edge?
customer_reviews.author: D. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The towel ring looks good and I liked the fact that it came with all the hardware and even the anchors. The one negative thing I have to say is that it is difficult to hang it perfectly straight. If you use the two screws on opposing sides (as mentioned in the instructions), it is not possible to compensate for inaccurate drill holes. The hardware also does not have any straight edges where you could hold a level against and check if it is straight. Other than that, it's a good towel ring and I'm fairly happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and looks very nice. It holds the towel far enough away from the wall so the damp towel isn’t sitting on the drywall
customer_reviews.author: mmh

customer_reviews.title: Looks elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice in my bathroom! Yes it is a bit dark & dull in finish but when I stalled, it looks great. Very elegant. Nice improvement in our bathroom remodel. We bought two, one for each side of mirror. Also bought the towel bar which still awaiting shipment. They will match nicely I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look and finish
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look and finish. Moen does it again. Holds standard hand towel. Will not allow for a bath towel unless bunched up
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Sticks out way too far...
customer_reviews.text: Product was just alright. I returned it. It sticks out pretty far off the wall, and I didnt like the look of that in our small space. The towel was practically hanging over into the sink area. It's also a lot darker "bronze" than i expected, and I could barely tell it was "oil rubbed."
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Seems like this product has been opened, returned, and then sold to me.  :(
customer_reviews.text: This arrived incomplete with no mounting hardware and no instructions. Really bad. Update: replacement arrived, with mounting hardware and instructions. Went up easily and product works as expected and described. Great product. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Install was easy, instructions clear
customer_reviews.text: Product matched well with Moen Brantford ORB faucets and Kwiset Lever door hardware. Install was easy, instructions clear. Secures well to the wall. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Great value on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Half the price on amazon for the same item at Bed Bath and Beyond. Easy install, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Love Moen products. Easy to install. Long lasting. This is beautiful and fits great in our newly renovated bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LucyN

customer_reviews.title: Great finish.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and color finish. I just posted another one. I have had this line in my summer house for 3 yrs and it still is brand new looking. Figured there was no risk of short longevity so I did this style again!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana F

customer_reviews.title: Difference color
customer_reviews.text: This is the oil rubbed bronze ring and it’s obviously not the same color as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Order it for a remodel in the hall bath and would definitely get in for the master bath.
customer_reviews.author: Texanadian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our main bathroom and used Moen products. They did not disappoint. We also redid the faucets with Moen. Love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Moses

customer_reviews.title: This Product is pretty easy to install and seems to work properly
customer_reviews.text: This Product is pretty easy to install and seems to work properly. My Only Complaint is the towel ring is darker than i would like. I expected more of a bronze color. But it still looks nice and fits in well with the rest of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rae1113

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in my bathroom, and it's really good quality. The kit came with anchors and screws so that we could install it anywhere. Excellent buy, I'd definitely recommend this. The color in the picture is true to life.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gervais

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but doesn’t stick too well on the wall for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Melgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great! It come with a drywall anchor which makes it nice and sturdy. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Bronze Towel Hanger
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in my new bathroom. Three stars because as others have said the ring is not heavy, but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: DaveFL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! A little tricky on the installation but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! A little tricky on the installation but I like that when I leave this apartment it doesn't seem like it would be too hard to bring this with me. I will update when we get a new place to see if I can re-install it in another bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Booher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy ring and looks great. The matching toilet paper roll also was easy to mount and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: Solid brown
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t look like brushed bronze to me. It’s solid brown. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kuato

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This product is of great quality. It works perfectly in my bathroom and looks so stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome in my powder room. Be sure to hang a towel from it when you're deciding where to hang it - the ring hangs down pretty far.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Christman

customer_reviews.title: High-quality Towel Ring (Brushed Nickel) that matches Stainless Steel Appliances
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ring to hang my kitchen towel right next to the sinks. It only took me a few minutes to install (after finding 2 properly sized screws, not included). I mounted on the side of my top kitchen cabinet next to the sink. The Brushed Nickel color perfectly matched my stainless steel GE Stovetop Oven, and my stainless steel Whirlpool dishwasher and refrigerator. The material is high quality and feels like it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lam

customer_reviews.title: They are very securely anchored into the wall (comes with great drywall anchors)
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these now (2 a couple years ago, and a third recently to match). They have held up very well even with kids pulling on them. They are very securely anchored into the wall (comes with great drywall anchors). Color is a definite oil-rubbed bronze and consistent. No signs of wear even after a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty sturdy and has no parts that are at risk of breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is solid product and you just can't beat the price. I was looking at the very same item at a local retailer and it was $10 more! I usually look in store, then go to amazon to see if I can find it cheaper and I usually can! Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Measure first
customer_reviews.text: Looks great with my other fixtures and accessories, the price was good. And it wasn't too difficult to install. It juts out enough from the wall so that a large or thick towel would fit and not touch the wall. But if you have a narrow space, be aware that the post is going to stick out 3 3/4 inches from the wall.
customer_reviews.author: ajaye

customer_reviews.title: Secure, easy install, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bathroom hand towel holder to match the other fixtures of my new bathroom renovation. It looks good, it's really secure, easy to install and does exactly what I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Will

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful high quality towel rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful high quality towel rack. This does not have the brushed/ multi tone look of oiled rubbed bronze, just the dark color.
customer_reviews.author: 1frugalmom

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and looks great now up in my newly remolded bathroom. Installed easily and quickly. Love the look of the oil rubbed bronze, and really appreciate it when Amazon recommends similar or "also purchased by others" items. It makes finding the right items much easier. Did have a little scracth on it, but I didn't bother returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Peachdkg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The functional part of the product is fine
customer_reviews.text: The finish is NOT oil rubbed bronze. It is black. The packaging states oil rubbed bronze, but unlike any other oil rubbed bronzed items we have purchased, there is no coppery color showing, it is solid black. Disappointed. The functional part of the product is fine.
customer_reviews.author: mfe2dog

customer_reviews.title: Wrong for me, maybe right for you.
customer_reviews.text: This was a wrong fit for me because I have the Brantford type sink and shower faucets. If you have Danbury it would match wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: OZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great and style is beautifully classic
customer_reviews.text: Works great and style is beautifully classic. I've always loved Moen products due to amazing product and incredible customer support.
customer_reviews.author: rcgoodman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, better price on Amazon (after checking the home improvement stores).
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality items, we purchased for a bathroom remodel. Looked at two home improvement stores and found these to be the best value and quality out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Keep the supplied Allen wrench handy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, but have had to tighten set screw 2 times since installation
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling off
customer_reviews.text: It keeps falling off the main part that attaches to wall.
customer_reviews.author: hg

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Sticks out a little further than I expected but I feel like that helps keep the hand towel dry. I like the look and it matches all of my bathroom accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka ZW

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: Found this Christmas gift in the garage. Love the other Moen towel rod and ring So I know this will look great and hold up to bathroom moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: My brother installed for me at a height made for tall people, so perfect! It has remained securely fastened to the wall for several months (my old one loosened up) so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B in Fresno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well-sturdy in the wall and enjoy the bronze look.
customer_reviews.author: AmyKCat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Basic hand towel hanger. Exactly what we needed. Wish there was a little more copper showing through.
customer_reviews.author: Elodie Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Not true bronze
customer_reviews.text: Oil rubbed bronze is not accurate. Compared to my bathroom fixtures, this looks like a very dark silver. Missed the return window so unfortunately I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This towel ring adds a nice touch and matches with all the other oil rubbed ...
customer_reviews.text: Used oiled rubbed bronze for all the interior hardware, etc. in our new house. This towel ring adds a nice touch and matches with all the other oil rubbed bronze fixtures and accessories we used. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to hang.
customer_reviews.text: They're instructions and way of installing this makes it SO easy. & literally had it hung in less than 5 minutes and I am not a DIYer whatsoever. Looks fantastic, easy intall and a good price on Amazon. Five stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Darker Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the matching set to this (towel bar and toilet paper holder). They are a really nice quality product but the color is nearly black. The photos show a bit of a dark brown bronze, but its much darker. Had to see it in sunlight to check for any brown/bronze and I'm still not sure there is.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hope

customer_reviews.title: Espresso.  Not bronze
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, but the color should be called espresso, not oil rubbed bronze. Does not match any of my other bronze bathroom pieces. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Airin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for your bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper on Amazon than the competition. Great product looks great holds great easy to install. No longer do I leave the wet hand towel next to the sink now it sits in a place of prestige.
customer_reviews.author: 504forlife

customer_reviews.title: I mixed and matched a few different Moen accessories (Wembly and Winford) and they all look like they are meant to go together
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive in my new bathroom. I mixed and matched a few different Moen accessories (Wembly and Winford) and they all look like they are meant to go together.
customer_reviews.author: billandcori

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but if you are wanting to see the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are more chocolate than oil rubbed bronze. Very pretty, but if you are wanting to see the bronze rubbed detail, you might want to go with a different one as these are primarily chocolate colored.
customer_reviews.author: _Brandeen_

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Looks amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months ago and my husband finally put it up and it looks AMAZING!! I bought the matching toilet paper holder and they look great in my bathroom. The ring doesn't move to much so the towel I hang on there stays in place. The color is a little darker then shown but it looks very nice and a lot more expensive then I bought it for. Great price, awesome product, and AWESOME BUY!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I used this in the guest bathroom for a hand towel, so guest would hopefully use the hand towel instead of the bath towel. It was easy to install and appears snug as a bug in a rug mounted to the wall! Also matches our other fixtures really well. Appears to be a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, looks good, ideal for what I had in mind..and large enough for a fluffy hand towel or med. bath towel.
customer_reviews.author: micki P

customer_reviews.title: High End Look!
customer_reviews.text: Great Moen fixture! Matches most bronze light fixtures. It has a very matte finish so take that into account when trying to match up items.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, quality merchandise, easy to install, and very handsome!
customer_reviews.author: PrsueHm

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I like this holder. The color matches the other Moab Danbury line perfect and the installation was simple. PROS: Easy to Install, Looks great CONS: Ring is tight in holder (doesn't rest straight down), Sits far from the wall (like 3" - would have preferred it to sit closer to the wall)
customer_reviews.author: RealWorld

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and pretty well made over all. Only complaint is that is does protrude from the wall a little more than I expected. But it isn't a deal breaker. Also, Amazon has the best prices on the Danbury accessories!
customer_reviews.author: NHolden

customer_reviews.title: Not really oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good quality item - definitely has some heft to it. But the color is not oil rubbed bronze. It's a dull brown finish. I looked around my bathroom after I unpacked it and everything I have that is oil rubbed bronze has a shine to it, and some copper coloring. This is just dull (matte) brown.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it matches with the rest of the items I bought for a rv remodel
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Works perfectly for a hand towel next to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie E. Canady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these and could not be happier! These are very easy to install and look fantastic in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: pdas980

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with supplied anchors. Product was color that was expected with no scratches or defects. It matches the faucet by the same company and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these; good value.  Nice look and feel. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these; good value. Nice look and feel & quality

customer_reviews.title: Anchor is unnecessarily complicated
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but I do not think plastic hollow wall plug is necessary. It is too deep if drilling to a beam.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Stupid design
customer_reviews.text: this is the most ridiculous design I’ve seen. It sticks out so far it’s a hazard. And now I’m stuck with this piece of junk because my handyman was delayed. Moen makes mistakes too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is holding up well after a year.

product_meta.title: Moen DN6786ORB Danbury Collection European Single Post Bathroom Hand Towel Ring, Oil-Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pack| Color:Oil-rubbed BronzeOffering a modern take on traditional design, the Moen Danbury Bathroom Towel Ring boasts ornate detailing with a sophisticated flair. Designed to match the Moen Danbury series of trims, this stylish towel ring for bathrooms comes with mounting hardware and a template for easy home installation. Choose from brushed nickel or oil-rubbed bronze finishes to match your home aesthetic. This towel ring is backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty.

AMAZON.COM


Add functionality and beauty to your bath (view larger). Moen's Danbury collection offers a blend of bold and delicate, tapered and tiered, and it's a discreet complement to a variety of bath decors. With its close proximity to the sink and faucet, this towel ring adds handy functionality as well as makes an important visual element in the bath. It has an oil rubbed bronze finish incorporates the warmth of bronze with tumbled light and dark accents, creating an antiqued look. It's also available in brushed nickel. 

The included template and mounting hardware takes the guesswork out of installation, and the towel ring includes a metal mounting post for extra security. The towel ring is constructed of corrosion resistant brass, while the post is made of zinc. It measures 6 inches in diameter and it extends 3.44 inches from the wall.

WHAT SETS MOEN APART?
From a variety of styles designed to complement today's decors to faucets that perfectly balance your water pressure, Moen sets the standard for exceptional beauty and reliable, innovative design. Additionally, all Moen products come with a Limited Lifetime Warranty against leaks, drips and finish defects.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Moen DN6786 Danbury towel ring; installation instructions

DN6786 DANBURY TOWEL RING
AT A GLANCE
 * Adds an important visual element to your bath
 * Oil rubbed bronze finish
 * Ring measures 6 inches in diameter
 * Included template and mounting hardware take the guesswork out of installation
 * Metal mounting post for extra security
 * Limited lifetime warranty



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For a modern take on traditional designs, the Danbury collection boasts ornate detailing in a variety of classic finishes. Danbury's sophisticated flourishes, like the Towel Ring in Oil Rubbed Bronze, add a traditional accent and polished style to any space. Easy to install and quality made, these specialty accessories were designed to last.

See more
feature_bullets: UNIQUE FINISH: Oil-Rubbed Bronze finish delivers a rich, dark brown, Old World finish with striking light and dark accents
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with other Moen bathroom accessories
FLEXIBLE PLACEMENT: For use in the bath as well as the kitchen for hanging towels and more
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty
